docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Government has decided to reduce the use of chemicals in the production of the nation's food, assigning a higher priority than in the past to protecting children's health and the environment. If the change of policy is fully carried out, it could alter everything about the way food is grown and what Americans eat. It was announced Friday by the Environmental Protection Agency, the Food and Drug Administration and the Department of Agriculture and will be reinforced in a scientific report to be issued Tuesday.

headline.main: U.S. Will Focus on Reducing Pesticides in Food Production
